scripts.install:all: npm run backend:install && npm run frontend:install
scripts.install:dev: npm run backend:install:dev && npm run frontend:install:dev && npm install
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black app/ tests/ && python -m isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:all: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.backend:docs: echo Opening API docs... && start http://192.168.35.52:8000/docs
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && (rmdir /s /q __pycache__ 2>nul || rm -rf __pycache__ 2>/dev/null || echo Cache cleaned)
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && (rmdir /s /q .expo node_modules 2>nul || rm -rf .expo node_modules 2>/dev/null || echo Cache cleaned)
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run backend:install:dev && npm run frontend:install:dev
scripts.release: git checkout main && git pull origin main && npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
